targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time(
  {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "Started"
    |= "of"
    |= "iterations"
[10d])) -
sum(count_over_time(
  {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "Finished"
    |= "of"
    |= "iterations"
[10d])) -
sum(count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_event_error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
[10d]))

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_event_error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
[10d])

panels.title: Number of Iterations Failed due to an Error

targets.expr:
sum(count_over_time({app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=credentialRecord"
  |= "state=OFFER_SENT" [10d])) -
  
sum(count_over_time({app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=credentialRecord"
  |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED" [10d])) -
  
sum(count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_event_error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
[10d]))

sum(count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_event_error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
[10d]))

panels.description: Average Number of Connections that are being activated per second
panels.title: Connection Activation Rate (per Second)

panels.description: Average Number of Credentials issued per second
panels.title: Credential Issuance Rate (per Second)

panels.description: Average Number of Proof Requests verified per second
panels.title: Proof Request Verification Rate (per Second)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

panels.title: Connection Protocol Transition Times  (per Minute in Milliseconds)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

panels.title: Credential Issuance Protocol Transition Times  (per Minute in Milliseconds)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=VERIFIED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=PRESENTATION_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=VERIFIED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=presentationRecord"
      |= "state=PRESENTATION_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (presentationExchangeId)
)

panels.title: Proof Request Protocol Transition Times  (per minute in Milliseconds)
HTTP Response Times (per Minute in Milliseconds)
Errors Raised by Aries HTTP Requests - (Issuer/Verifier and Holder)
Total Number of Failed HTTP Requests
Total Number of Errors Reported through Events

targets.expr:
count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_event_error"
    |= "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
[1m])
targets.legendFormat: AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found.

targets.expr:
{app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_event_error"
    != "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Revocation registry metadata not found."
    != "AcaPyPublisher.handleCredential: Record not found."
